name: Timaru Boys' High School Memorial Library
openingHours:
Ore di scuola - rivolgetevi all'ufficio.

offers.description: Free admission and guidance. Research approval granted through TBHS staff- The Rector Mr Kevin O'sullivan or Mr Cameron.
